properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 13 at 2:47PM CST until February 15 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Nashville TN
properties.description:
...The Flood Advisory is cancelled for the Duck River...

Duck River Near Hurricane Mills affecting Humphreys County

...The Flood Advisory continues for the Richland Creek...

Richland Creek Above Pulaski affecting Giles County

.The Flood Advisory for Hurricane Mills has been replaced by a Flood Warning.
Water levels on Richland Creek will continue to slowly rise and are expected
to crest late tonight.

The Flood Advisory continues for
The Richland Creek Above Pulaski
* Until Saturday afternoon.
* At 02PM Thursday the stage was 18.4 feet and rising slowly.
* Action stage is 16.0 feet.
* Flood stage is 20.0 feet.
* The river will rise to near 19.5 feet tomorrow morning.
* At 20.0 feet...Portions of Vales Mill Rd between Chicken Creek Rd and the
Highway 64 bypass become inundated and may be subject to closure
* At 16.0 feet...Flooding of low lying agricultural land along the river begins
properties.instruction:
Stay tuned to NOAA weather radio or other local media for further information
from the National Weather Service.
